app_descript:
Brief: Draw Puzzle, also known as DOP - Draw One Part, is a delightful and challenging puzzle game that combines drawing with problem-solving. Players are presented with a semi-completed image and must use their wits to figure out what the missing part is. The twist? You're only allowed to use a single continuous line to complete the picture. With a reliance on artificial intelligence to interpret your drawings, this game tests your creativity and perception as you draw lines to fulfill the puzzling scenarios.
